circumstances: On final approach to Columbia Airport by night, during the last segment, the pilot overshot the center line and completed a sharp turn to the right when the airplane lost height and crashed in flames short of runway threshold. The airplane was destroyed by impact forces and a post crash fire and all six occupants were killed.
probable_cause:
The pilot failed to obtain/maintain flying speed on final approach. The following factors were reported: 
- Improperly loaded aircraft and CofG,
- Overshot the center line in sharp descending turn to the right, 
- The airplane was overloaded by 200 pounds.
